title: Tidy Finance Talks
text:
Over the past years, we gave several talks on Tidy Finance in various venues. Here, we collect a sample of these talks, share the slides, and link videos when they are available. We are always excited to talk about Tidy Finance in general or specific topics - feel free to reach out, and you can also consider our workshops.



InfoSlidesVideo


Christoph Scheuch gave a talk on “Value Companies using Discounted Cash Flow Analysis” in the R Consortium Webinar on October 9, 2024. Find more details on the webinar series here.
Find the slides and a video recording in the following tabs.













InfoSlidesVideo


Christoph Scheuch gave a talk on “Analyze Companies using Financial Ratios” in the R Consortium Webinar on October 9, 2024. Find more details on the webinar series here.
Find the slides and a video recording in the following tabs.

Christoph Scheuch gave a talk on “Evaluate Performance using the Capital Asset Pricing Model” in the R Consortium Webinar on October 9, 2024. Find more details on the webinar series here.

Christoph Scheuch gave a talk on “Optimize Portfolios using the Markowitz Model” in the R Consortium Webinar on September 4, 2024. Find more details on the webinar series here.

Christoph Scheuch gave a talk on “Empowering Reproducible Finance through Tidy Finance” at posit::conf(2024) on August 14, 2024. Find more details about the conference in Seattle here.
Find the slides and a video recording in the following tabs.

Christoph Scheuch gave a talk on “Accessing and Managing Financial Data with Tidy Finance” at useR!2024 on July 9, 2024. Find more details about the useR conference 2024 in Salzburg here.
